00020 int     main(void)
00021 {       
00022         //variable declaration (128 is the center of the LCD screen)
00023         int                     top_bottom_axe = 128;
00024         int                     right_left_axe = 128;
00025         char            top_bottom[10]; 
00026         char            right_left[10];
00027 
00028         //This buffers will stock the pixels to display, 
00029         GraphicBuffer           LCD_Buffer_Video;
00030         UInt8                                   LCD_Buffer[LCD_WIDTH*LCD_HEIGHT*BITS];
00031         UInt8                                    ASCII_Buffer[LCD_WIDTH*LCD_HEIGHT*BITS];  // Buffer to stock the ascii table in bitmap format
00032 
00033         //Initialize POB-EYE (lib), POB-LCD (lib), POB-PROTO(file Functions.c) and Servomotors
00034         InitPobeye2();
00035         InitLCD();                      
00036         InitPobProto();
00037         SwitchOnAllServo();
00038 
00039         // Initialize the Graphic buffer with 128 per 64, one pixel per bit and LCD_Buffer
00040         InitGraphicBuffer( &LCD_Buffer_Video, LCD_WIDTH,LCD_HEIGHT,ONE_BIT,LCD_Buffer);
00041 
00042         //Clear and draw the buffer to make clean the screen
00043         ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00044         DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00045         
00046         // Init Ascii buffer, use to write in the LCD screen with PrintTextOnPobLCD function
00047         InitAsciiBuffer(); 
00048 
00049         while (1)
00050         {               
00051                 //get the values of pad
00052                 top_bottom_axe = GetPortAnalog(UP_DOWN_AXE);
00053                 right_left_axe = GetPortAnalog(RIGHT_LEFT_AXE);
00054                 
00055                 if (top_bottom_axe > 200)
00056                         MoveBot(RUN);
00057                 else if (top_bottom_axe < 100)
00058                         MoveBot(BACK);
00059                 else if (right_left_axe >200)
00060                         MoveBot(RIGHT);
00061                 else if (right_left_axe < 100)
00062                         MoveBot(LEFT); 
00063                 else
00064                         MoveBot(STOP);
00065 
00066             //convert it from int to string
00067                 PrintToABuffer(top_bottom, "%d", top_bottom_axe); 
00068                 PrintToABuffer(right_left, "%d", right_left_axe);
00069                 
00070                 //display it
00071                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(1, 2, "Top", LCD_Buffer);
00072                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(2, 1, "Bottom", LCD_Buffer);
00073                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(5, 3, top_bottom, LCD_Buffer);
00074                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(1, 8, "Right", LCD_Buffer);
00075                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(2, 8, "Left", LCD_Buffer);
00076                 PrintTextOnPobLCD(5, 8, right_left, LCD_Buffer);
00077                 DrawLCD(&LCD_Buffer_Video);
00078         }
00079 return 0;       
00080 }
